body: This was awesome to read. Wished it continued more
I expected something horrible looking at the cover. Glad it was a vanilla tsundre.

Not bad, art could be better but it definitly comes through due to her assets!
Would be really awesome to see some more quality works with her involved.

Seiri-san is rather tsundere, right to the end, ... although, that's probably more in line with the light novel content, as opposed to her appearances in anime to date. Notwithstanding, ... Touma, you Lucky Bastard.
